summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the Scaled set
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=orange]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.


  °°° HD  texture replacer for scaled set 

  °°°  Same resolution as the official high-res DLC textures
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.

  °°°  This work should be compatible with everything

  °°° about V2 update: much brighter textures,there should be no issue in any enviroment or enb       settings, greatly improved fur parts   

old v1 release files remain in download section as resource for modders INSIDE NEXUS SITES where their use is free, CONDITIO SINE QUA NON is that you give proper credits for the use of v1 release textures, in other words...always give credits for work that is not yours,or you\'re just stealing...seems fair and appropriate to me.

 IMPORTANT... this remake is not included in book of silence yet, will be included  in book of silence 2, so install this mod AFTER it, overriding eventually.

  °°°  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: Drop the \"textures\" folder inside your Data folder, or just use the mod manager.


[center]Credits:[color=orange]black coffe ,nicotine,46 and 2 (Drunvalo Melchizedek theory) [/color][/center]
author: CaBaL
